page.title: 06 The Ambulance Station
page.content:
We visited the ambulance station on Birch St. and went in all sorts of ambulances. We saw the equipment in the ambulances. The station officer said that the station was the Division headquarters and all the meetings take place there with some chiefs coming from as far away as Glossop.
The station is the main repair place for all the ambulances in the Division . There were 24 ambulances in from a small four wheel drive Range Rover they use on hills and narrow roads to the big emergency ones they use at motorway pile ups.
Tracy Dean age 9
